description:
What's up gang! We're set up now for more INTERACTIVE sound stage videos for Patrons Only! 

Today we're going to start by digging into Space Hulk (2009). In Part 1 we're doing PREP and figuring out what I need to build and paint for Mission 1! I'm going to keep shooting these next week so let's get into it!
title: #TBT - Space Hulk (2009) - Part 1 (Planning)

description:
The Dwarfs march to war! A Greatest-Hits compilation of rules for classic models as well as modifications to existing model kits... this new Arcane Journal pleases my old-timey Dwarf heart. Let's check it out!

Big thanks to GW for the complimentary copy of the book to review. 

#adwip 
#WarhammerTheOldWorld
#warhammercommunity 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Intro and Outro music used
title: GMG Reviews - Warhammer: The Old World - Arcane Journal: Dwarfen Mountain Holds

description:
It's into the UNDERHELLS. Loved Space Hulk? Love Aliens? Want to pit a suicide-squad of Gangers against an endless nightmare horde of aliens in the ruins of a Dead hive as they seek to confront and kill the monstrous Brood-Father lurking there? Let's dive into Hive Secundus, the one-off game mode expansion and two-player game box from the Boxed Game team at Games Workshop.
 
Thanks to GW for the copy of the Box to review. 

#AdWIP
#Necroumnda
#WarhammerCommunity

title: GMG Reviews - Necromunda: Hive Secundus  by Games Workshop
